hero.name: MakVieSAinte
hero.description: I am a developer passionate about creating innovative web experiences and the art of transforming ideas into digital solutions. My approach combines
hero.description2: and technical expertise to design high-performing and aesthetic applications. I believe that every project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and create something unique.

articles.title: Recent Articles
articles.description: I regularly share my discoveries, reflections, and projects around web development and new technologies.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: An idea, a project, a professional opportunity, or simply a question? Leave me your email and I will get back to you quickly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Find here the answers to the most common questions.

typesProjects.q: What types of projects do you work on?
typesProjects.a: I develop interactive websites, front-end and back-end applications, as well as complete full-stack solutions tailored to my clients‚Äô needs.

technologies.q: What languages and technologies do you master?
technologies.a: I mainly work with JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, React, Node.js, MongoDB, TailwindCSS and Git, while staying open to exploring new technologies depending on the project.

process.q: How does your work process go?
process.a: My process includes five steps: needs discovery, design, development, review and feedback, then delivery and support if needed.

testsBeforeDelivery.a: Yes, I test all features and the user experience to ensure performance and reliability.

priceFix.q: How do you set the price of a project?
priceFix.a: The price depends on complexity, estimated time, and requested features. I always provide a detailed quote before starting.

hourlyOrFixed.q: Do you work hourly or at a fixed price?
hourlyOrFixed.a: I can adapt to both: fixed price for a complete project or hourly rate for specific tasks or adjustments.

deadlines.q: What are your average delivery times?
deadlines.a: The deadlines depend on project complexity. In general, a simple site can be delivered in 2 to 4 weeks, while a complete application requires more time.

delays.q: What happens if the project takes longer than expected?
delays.a: I immediately communicate any delay and propose solutions to meet your priorities while maintaining quality.

whoAreYou.q: Who are you and what is your background?
whoAreYou.a: I am MakVieSainte, software developer and web designer. Passionate about coding for several years, I started programming in high school before continuing my studies at university. In my second year, I did an internship which ended that same year with a fixed-term contract (CDD). This experience allowed me to strengthen my skills and confirm my commitment to web development.

frontOrBack.q: Are you more oriented towards front-end or back-end?
frontOrBack.a: I master both, but I have a strong passion for creating accessible and high-performing user interfaces, so I lean more towards front-end.

hobbies.q: What are your passions outside of development?
hobbies.a: Outside of development, I am very interested in psychology and I love diving into documentaries to learn more. I am also passionate about graphic design and football.

skillToDevelop.q: What skill would you like to develop this year?
skillToDevelop.a: This year, I am trying to broaden my skillset beyond pure development. I am particularly interested in DevOps, to better understand deployment, continuous integration and environment automation. At the same time, I am also discovering the basics of LLMs (Large Language Models) in artificial intelligence. Finally, I am learning automated testing with UiPath to strengthen the quality and reliability of the projects I work on.

favorite.title: Favorite Technologies
favorite.description: These tools are for me much more than languages or frameworks: they are partners to transform ideas into concrete and engaging experiences.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: My projects reflect my passion for design and engineering. Each creation is designed to combine aesthetics, performance, and user experience.

skills.title: Skills and Tools
skills.description: From front-end to back-end, including design and software testing, I master a variety of technologies and tools.

works.title: Professional Experiences
works.intro: Each mission strengthened my passion for design, front-end and back-end development, as well as creative problem-solving.

ayokai.description: Ayokai is a software development and testing company. Within a small agile and hyper-programming-oriented team, I contribute to the design and implementation of scalable and secure web applications.
bullets: Integration of mobile-first web interfaces with Vue.js, HTML/CSS, and TailwindCSS.
Creation of robust and secure APIs with Express.js, protected by JWT middleware and structured in modular architecture.
Data modeling with Mongoose ORM to ensure consistency between services.
Close collaboration with QA/testers to deliver regression-free features through cross-testing practices.

qa.title: QA / Software Tester
qa.description: In addition to development, I am part of the QA team where I contribute to writing test plans, executing scenarios, and automating tests.

card.title: Ayokai Congo
card.description: Ayokai is a software testing and development company based in Europe and Africa. We help businesses strengthen their quality processes to accelerate delivery.

possacode.description: Possacode is a non-profit organization based in the Republic of Congo, committed to empowering and connecting developers through learning and collaboration.
bullets: Participation in a supportive and engaged tech community focused on open knowledge sharing.
Participation in open-source initiatives and group workshops, with peer-to-peer mentoring.

lead.title: Technical Lead
lead.description: Managing internal projects, leading practical workshops, and supporting community members in skill development.

freelance.description: Creation of tailor-made visuals for various clients and brands: logos, posters, web banners, and social media content.
